entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of snow squalls. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon.
